TopicTitle: Is it possible to set a key for any action group or robotic part?

Articles.Content: I want to make ailerons on the plane go only up using robotic parts. But I want to set a key for each aileron to roll (E for rolling right and Q for rolling left). I`ve just started doing crafts with robotic parts and this plane is my first craft with them.
Yes you can. You're looking at axis groups. Just assign the actuators to the "roll" axis (or if you're using the KAL-1000, assign its animation position to the same axis).
